answers.answer: Thanks a lot for your response :)I am a regular on this site now and i truely appreciate the attention and concern the members show for the people who have worries/question (which can be quite overwhelming at times!) question: can the medication Glipizide for diabetes interfere with the orasure test results? can anyone seroconvert after 14 weeks?
title: medicine interference?
